remarks: A partition is one to one.  (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 11-Dec-2019.)
statement:
fourierdlem34.p $e |- P = ( m e. NN |-> { p e. ( RR ^m ( 0 ... m ) ) | ( ( ( p ` 0 ) = A /\ ( p ` m ) = B ) /\ A. i e. ( 0 ..^ m ) ( p ` i ) < ( p ` ( i + 1 ) ) ) } ) $.
fourierdlem34.m $e |- ( ph -> M e. NN ) $.
fourierdlem34.q $e |- ( ph -> Q e. ( P ` M ) ) $.
fourierdlem34 $p |- ( ph -> Q : ( 0 ... M ) -1-1-> RR ) $.
$d A m p $.
$d B m p $.
$d M i $.
$d M i m p $.
$d Q i $.
$d Q i p $.
$d i ph $.
